Events.OnCreate:
(block (targetObj)
; Look for a suitable target (setq targetObj (random (sysFindObject aOwnerObj (cat "TAE +ares; +majorStation;")) ))
; If no such station exists, then create one deep in the outer system. ; NOTE: It is OK that this has side effects as long as the station that ; we create is a major Ares station (so subsequent calls will find it). (if (not targetObj) (setq targetObj (sysCreateStation &stAresCommune; (sysVectorRandom Nil (random 960 1500) 150)) ) )
; Create the mission (msnRegisterForEvents gSource targetObj) (msnSetData gSource 'targetID (objGetID targetObj)) (msnSetData gSource 'missionXP 250) )
Events.OnCanDebrief:
(block (wingmenLeft) ; Wingmen leave (setq wingmenLeft (intFleetDisperseWingmen gSource)) (msnSetData gSource 'wingmenLeft wingmenLeft) ; XP bonus for each surviving wingman (msnIncData gSource 'missionXP (* 100 wingmenLeft))
Nil )

Language.Text:
The XO walks up to you.
"Good to see you pilot. We've got a mission for you."
"This mission is straight from Admiral Decker himself. We want you to lead a flight of Britannias to destroy %targetName% in this system. Any questions?"
Language.String: "Get the hell out of here then!"
"What is your major malfunction!? Get back out there and complete your mission!"
"You screwed that mission all the way to Sol and back. You better hit the sims, pilot!"
"A tough mission. We can't afford to lose so many good pilots."
"Good mission! It's unfortunate that only one of your wingmen survived."
"Outstanding mission! Looks like you came back with %wingmenLeft% wingmen."
